mapper.sql: id, yh_id, sfsc, cjsj, gxsj, zxkssj, zxjssj, ryjj
mapper.select: select jjr.*,yh.yhm,yh.yhbh,yh.zsxm,yh.lxdh,yh.yhtx,yh.yhlb,yh.yhjb,yh.yhyx, xs.yx,xs.xslbmc,xs.xb,xs.yjfx,xs.ybyyx from t_js_jjr jjr left join t_yh yh on(yh.id = jjr.yh_id) left join t_xs xs on(xs.yh_id = jjr.yh_id) where jjr.sfsc = false and yh.sfsc = false and xs.sfsc = false and jjr.id = #{id}
